li.p: Measurement accuracy is determined by the size of voxel (the pixel of the image recon-struction represents the size of voxel). For example, the measurement accuracy of the image with scanning voxel of 1 mm×1 mm×1 mm is 1 mm along axis X, Y and Z.

Measurement accuracy is determined by the size of voxel (the pixel of the image recon-struction represents the size of voxel). For example, the measurement accuracy of the image with scanning voxel of 1 mm×1 mm×1 mm is 1 mm along axis X, Y and Z.
